paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the TTR gene variant Val30Met and its association with ATTR amyloidosis, detailing penetrance data and individual cases.

individual_records.phenotype_details: suffered from both polyneuropathy and cardiomyopathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Vitreous body material was collected by vitrectomy from the eye of a Swedish carrier of the ATTR Val30Met variant who suffered from both polyneuropathy and cardiomyopathy.

functional_data.summary: The study characterizes the structural basis for amyloid formation in the vitreous body related to the Val30Met variant.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is associated with disease in the reported patient.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the polymorphism of ATTR fibrils and their structural characteristics.
key_quotes: Vitreous body material was collected by vitrectomy from the eye of a Swedish carrier of the ATTR Val30Met variant who suffered from both polyneuropathy and cardiomyopathy.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper focused on the TTR gene variant Val30Met.
